data.title: Douglas Jackson – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Douglas Jackson. Browse Douglas Jackson’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Blood Roses

The Warsaw Quartet, Book 1

By: Douglas Jackson

Narrated by: Mark Meadows

Length: 11 hrs and 50 mins

Unabridged

Overall

2.5 out of 5 stars 2

Performance

4 out of 5 stars 2

Story

2.5 out of 5 stars 2

September 1939. A city ruled by fear. A population brutalised by restrictions and reprisals. Amid the devastation, another hunter begins to prowl. What are a few more deaths amid scores of daily executions?

1 out of 5 stars

Phillip Kerr's name taken in vain

The Warsaw Quartet, Book 2

Length: 9 hrs and 27 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

In the ghetto, the last 50,000 Jews await their fate, but, unlike those who preceded them to the death camps, these Jews are prepared to fight. Jan Kalisz, Kripo investigator and Resistance double-agent, has promised to supply them with weapons.
